name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's Talk Screen Sharing Chrome Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension provides ability to share screen for Let's Talk application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension provides ability to share screen for Let's Talk application and should be used only with Telaverge Let's Talk product.
